org.smartregister.sync

Class CloudantSyncHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smartregister.sync.CloudantSyncHandler

  • public class CloudantSyncHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles cloundant replication/sync processes. Created by koros on 3/16/16.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudantSyncHandler(android.content.Context context) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete(ReplicationCompleted rc)
      Calls the SecuredActivity's replicationComplete method on the main thread, as the complete() callback will probably come from a replicator worker thread.
      void error(ReplicationErrored re)
      Calls the SecuredActivity's replicationComplete method on the main thread, as the error() callback will probably come from a replicator worker thread.
      static CloudantSyncHandler getInstance(android.content.Context context) 
      JsonObject getReplicationFiler(java.lang.String designDocumentId) 
      void reloadReplicationSettings(PullFilter pullFilter)
      Stops running replications and reloads the replication settings from the app's preferences.
      java.lang.String replicationFilterSettings() 
      void setCountDownLatch(java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch countDownLatch) 
      java.lang.Boolean setReplicationFilter(JsonObject jsonObject, java.lang.String designDocumentId) 
      void setReplicationListener(CloudantSyncListener listener)
      Sets the listener for replication callbacks as a weak reference.
      void startPullReplication()
      Starts the configured pull replication.
      void startPushReplication()
      Starts the configured push replication.
      void stopAllReplications()
      Stops running replications.

      • setReplicationListener

        public void setReplicationListener(CloudantSyncListener listener)
        Sets the listener for replication callbacks as a weak reference.
        Parameters:
        listener - CloudantSyncListener to receive callbacks.

      • stopAllReplications

        public void stopAllReplications()

        Stops running replications.

        The stop() methods stops the replications asynchronously, see the replicator docs for more information.

      • startPushReplication

        public void startPushReplication()

        Starts the configured push replication.

      • startPullReplication

        public void startPullReplication()

        Starts the configured pull replication.

      • reloadReplicationSettings

        public void reloadReplicationSettings(PullFilter pullFilter)
                               throws java.lang.Exception

        Stops running replications and reloads the replication settings from the app's preferences.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • complete

        public void complete(ReplicationCompleted rc)
        Calls the SecuredActivity's replicationComplete method on the main thread, as the complete() callback will probably come from a replicator worker thread.

      • error

        public void error(ReplicationErrored re)
        Calls the SecuredActivity's replicationComplete method on the main thread, as the error() callback will probably come from a replicator worker thread.
